name: 郭五鳳
objective: This course, A.I. in Business Management, provides a comprehensive introduction to the core principles of business management and explores the role of Artificial Intelligence (AI) in transforming business management practices. Students will examine how AI enhances decision-making, improves operational efficiency, and drives innovation across industries. The course combines with theoretical frameworks, real-world case studies, in class focus group discussion to equip students with the skills needed to leverage AI in strategic business applications.

scorePolicy: Students will engage in team and individual presentations, contributing 30% to the midterm and 40% to the final exam. The remaining 30% of the overall grade will be determined by class attendance.

課程是否導入AI: AI1：使用生成式 AI 作為教學過程的輔助工具（Use generative AI tools as an aid to the teaching process）AI4：簡單介紹 AI 的基本概念（Briefly introduce the basic concept of AI）
